sentences.sContent: The controversy has arisen over the text of the preamble to the unification treaty.
sentences.sCn: 就统一条约的序文措词出现了争论。

phrases.pCn: 直截了当地，开门见山地，单刀直入地

remMethod.val: pre (前) + amble (跑) → 一本书中跑在最前面的话 → 前言

trans.tranOther: A preamble is an introduction that comes before something you say or write
